title: Virtual World-Based Science Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Online Learning Experience Required
context.additional_context: Project-based learning to improve social interaction for science professionals via virtual world platforms.

learning_goals: In virtual environments, students can collaborate with peers to complete science experiment simulation projects.
In 3D virtual spaces, nonverbal communication (facial expressions/gestures) can be used to convey ideas.
Through blended online-offline activities, a sense of community in science learning can be fostered.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
